intro: Notoseris macilenta, commonly known as the slender notoseris, is a flowering plant native to arid and semi-arid regions of southern Africa. It belongs to the Asteraceae family, which is characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant typically grows as a low, spreading shrub with narrow, hairy leaves adapted to conserve water. Its small, yellow flowers are clustered in heads, and it produces small, dry fruits known as achenes. Notoseris macilenta is well-suited to harsh environments and is often found in rocky or sandy soils.
